title: More logical sorting process needed for disk sorting when there is a border value for the row count
OB: When sorting on disk, if sorting on a dataset of 40000 rows and the program is set to process data less than 40000 rows, the following operation is performed:
SR:
1. Set up a dataset of 40000 rows 
2. Run the program with a limit on processing less than 40000 rows 
3. Observe the sorting operation on disk
